who_we_are.title: Who We Are
who_we_are.description: Eskan is a dedicated web platform designed to simplify the rental process. Whether you're a newcomer looking for an affordable place or a property owner wanting to list your available spaces, Eskan provides a seamless and user-friendly solution.

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.description: We strive to make housing more accessible for expatriates moving across Egypt. Our platform connects individuals searching for shared accommodations with property owners, ensuring a smooth and secure housing experience.

people_first.title: People First
people_first.description: We're dedicated to helping our members thrive. From finding the perfect home to providing 24/7 support, we put people at the center of everything we do.

best_quality.title: Best Quality
best_quality.description: We're passionate about providing excellent service and creating a high-quality experience for our community.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive
comprehensive.description: Easily browse and filter housing options by location, price, and amenities.

verified_owners.title: Verified Owners
verified_owners.description: We ensure safety by verifying owners through legal document submissions and online meetings.
